```{r setup}

library(crossdome)

data('mage_off_targets')
query <- 'EVDPIGHLY'

#

subject <- mage_off_targets$peptide_sequence
subject <- cross_universe(subject, allele = "HLA-A*01:01")

result <- cross_compose(query = query, subject = subject)
```

```{r}

# Contra background
background <- cross_universe(allele = "HLA-A*01:01")
result <- cross_compose(query = query, background = background)


```


```{r}

subject <- mage_off_targets$peptide_sequence
background <- cross_universe(peptides = mage_off_target, allele = "HLA-A*01:01")

result <- cross_compose(query = query, subject = background)

```
